definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: roast flesh (NH id.; so Ar. s’alawa: (s.lah.), Eth. s.alah.a);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. [[יִחְלֶה חָלִי]] Is 44:16 he roasteth a roast; 1 s. [[אֶחְלֶה בָשָׂר]] v:Is 44:19; Inf. cstr. [[לִחְלוֹת]] 1Sa 2:15 give flesh ([[בָּשָׂר]]) to roast.
